verses.verse: But a certain <S%G5100><s%> man <S%G435><s%> named <S%G3686><s%> Ananias, <S%G367><s%> with his wife <S%G1135><s%> Sapphira, <S%G4551><s%> sold <S%G4453><s%> a piece <S%G2933><s%> of property, <S%G2933><s%>

and kept <S%G3557><s%> back <S%G3557><s%> [some] of the price <S%G5092><s%> for himself, with his wife's full <S%G4924><s%> knowledge, <S%G4924><s%> and bringing <S%G5342><s%> a portion <S%G3313><s%> of it, he laid <S%G5087><s%> it at the apostles' feet. <S%G4228><s%>

But Peter <S%G4074><s%> said, <S%G3004><s%> "Ananias, <S%G367><s%> why <S%G1223><s%> <S%G5101><s%> has Satan <S%G4567><s%> filled <S%G4137><s%> your heart <S%G2588><s%> to lie <S%G5574><s%> to the Holy <S%G40><s%> Spirit, <S%G4151><s%> and to keep <S%G3557><s%> back <S%G3557><s%> [some] of the price <S%G5092><s%> of the land <S%G5564><s%>?

"While it remained <S%G3306><s%> [unsold,] did it not remain <S%G3306><s%> your own? And after it was sold, <S%G4097><s%> was it not under <S%G1722><s%> your control <S%G1849><s%>? Why <S%G5101><s%> is it that you have conceived <S%G5087><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> deed <S%G4229><s%> in your heart <S%G2588><s%>? You have not lied <S%G5574><s%> to men, <S%G444><s%> but to God. <S%G2316><s%>"

And as he heard <S%G191><s%> these <S%G3778><s%> words, <S%G3056><s%> Ananias <S%G367><s%> fell <S%G4098><s%> down <S%G4098><s%> and breathed <S%G1634><s%> his last; <S%G1634><s%> and great <S%G3173><s%> fear <S%G5401><s%> came <S%G1096><s%> upon all <S%G3956><s%> who heard <S%G191><s%> of it.
And the young <S%G3501><s%> men <S%G3501><s%> arose <S%G450><s%> and covered <S%G4958><s%> him up, and after carrying <S%G1627><s%> him out, they buried <S%G2290><s%> him.

Now <S%G1161><s%> there elapsed <S%G1096><s%> an interval <S%G1292><s%> of about <S%G5613><s%> three <S%G5140><s%> hours, <S%G5610><s%> and his wife <S%G1135><s%> came <S%G1525><s%> in, not knowing <S%G3609><s%> what had happened. <S%G1096><s%>

And Peter <S%G4074><s%> responded <S%G611><s%> to her, "Tell <S%G3004><s%> me whether <S%G1487><s%> you sold <S%G591><s%> the land <S%G5564><s%> for such <S%G5118><s%> and such <S%G5118><s%> a price <S%G5118><s%>?" And she said, <S%G3004><s%> "Yes, <S%G3483><s%> that was the price. <S%G5118><s%>"

Then <S%G1161><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%> [said] to her, "Why <S%G5101><s%> is it that you have agreed <S%G4856><s%> together <S%G4856><s%> to put <S%G3985><s%> the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> of the Lord <S%G2962><s%> to the test <S%G3985><s%>? Behold, <S%G2400><s%> the feet <S%G4228><s%> of those <S%G3588><s%> who have buried <S%G2290><s%> your husband <S%G435><s%> are at the door, <S%G2374><s%> and they shall carry <S%G1627><s%> you out [as well]."

And she fell <S%G4098><s%> immediately <S%G3916><s%> at his feet, <S%G4228><s%> and breathed <S%G1634><s%> her last; <S%G1634><s%> and the young <S%G3495><s%> men <S%G3495><s%> came <S%G1525><s%> in and found <S%G2147><s%> her dead, <S%G3498><s%> and they carried <S%G1627><s%> her out and buried <S%G2290><s%> her beside <S%G4314><s%> her husband. <S%G435><s%>

And great <S%G3173><s%> fear <S%G5401><s%> came <S%G1096><s%> upon the whole <S%G3650><s%> church, <S%G1577><s%> and upon all <S%G3956><s%> who heard <S%G191><s%> of these <S%G3778><s%> things. <S%G3778><s%>

And at the hands <S%G5495><s%> of the apostles <S%G652><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> signs <S%G4592><s%> and wonders <S%G5059><s%> were taking <S%G1096><s%> place <S%G1096><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> the people; <S%G2992><s%> and they were all <S%G3956><s%> with one <S%G3661><s%> accord <S%G3661><s%> in Solomon's portico. <S%G4745><s%>

But none <S%G3762><s%> of the rest <S%G3062><s%> dared <S%G5111><s%> to associate <S%G2853><s%> with them; however, <S%G235><s%> the people <S%G2992><s%> held <S%G3170><s%> them in high <S%G3170><s%> esteem. <S%G3170><s%>

And all <S%G3123><s%> the more <S%G3123><s%> believers <S%G4100><s%> in the Lord, <S%G2962><s%> multitudes <S%G4128><s%> of men <S%G435><s%> and women, <S%G1135><s%> were constantly added <S%G4369><s%> to [their number];

to such <S%G5620><s%> an extent <S%G5620><s%> that they even <S%G2532><s%> carried <S%G1627><s%> the sick <S%G772><s%> out into the streets, <S%G4116><s%> and laid <S%G5087><s%> them on cots <S%G2825><s%> and pallets, <S%G2895><s%> so <S%G2443><s%> that when Peter <S%G4074><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> by, at least <S%G2579><s%> his shadow <S%G4639><s%> might fall <S%G1982><s%> on any <S%G5100><s%> one <S%G5100><s%> of them.

And also <S%G2532><s%> the people <S%G4128><s%> from the cities <S%G4172><s%> in the vicinity <S%G4038><s%> of Jerusalem <S%G2419><s%> were coming <S%G4905><s%> together, <S%G4905><s%> bringing <S%G5342><s%> people who were sick <S%G772><s%> or <S%G2532><s%> afflicted <S%G3791><s%> with unclean <S%G169><s%> spirits; <S%G4151><s%> and they were all <S%G537><s%> being healed. <S%G2323><s%>

But the high <S%G749><s%> priest <S%G749><s%> rose <S%G450><s%> up, along <S%G2532><s%> with all <S%G3956><s%> his associates <S%G4862><s%> (that is the sect <S%G139><s%> of the Sadducees <S%G4523><s%>), and they were filled <S%G4092><s%> with jealousy; <S%G2205><s%>
and they laid <S%G1911><s%> hands <S%G5495><s%> on the apostles, <S%G652><s%> and put <S%G5087><s%> them in a public <S%G1219><s%> jail. <S%G5084><s%>

But an angel <S%G32><s%> of the Lord <S%G2962><s%> during <S%G1223><s%> the night <S%G3571><s%> opened <S%G455><s%> the gates <S%G2374><s%> of the prison, <S%G5438><s%> and taking <S%G1806><s%> them out he said, <S%G3004><s%>

"Go <S%G4198><s%> your way, <S%G4198><s%> stand <S%G2476><s%> and speak <S%G2980><s%> to the people <S%G2992><s%> in the temple <S%G2413><s%> the whole <S%G3956><s%> message <S%G4487><s%> of this <S%G3778><s%> Life. <S%G2222><s%>"

And upon hearing <S%G191><s%> [this,] they entered <S%G1525><s%> into the temple <S%G2413><s%> about <S%G5259><s%> daybreak, <S%G3722><s%> and [began] to teach. <S%G1321><s%> Now <S%G1161><s%> when the high <S%G749><s%> priest <S%G749><s%> and his associates <S%G4862><s%> had come, <S%G1525><s%> they called <S%G4779><s%> the Council <S%G4892><s%> together, <S%G4779><s%> even <S%G2532><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the Senate <S%G1087><s%> of the sons <S%G5207><s%> of Israel, <S%G2274><s%> and sent <S%G649><s%> [orders] to the prison <S%G1201><s%> house <S%G1201><s%> for them to be brought. <S%G71><s%>
But the officers <S%G5257><s%> who came <S%G3854><s%> did not find <S%G2147><s%> them in the prison; <S%G5438><s%> and they returned, <S%G390><s%> and reported <S%G518><s%> back,

saying, <S%G3004><s%> "We found <S%G2147><s%> the prison <S%G1201><s%> house <S%G1201><s%> locked <S%G2808><s%> quite <S%G3956><s%> securely <S%G803><s%> and the guards <S%G5441><s%> standing <S%G2476><s%> at the doors; <S%G2374><s%> but when we had opened <S%G455><s%> up, we found <S%G2147><s%> no <S%G3762><s%> one <S%G3762><s%> inside. <S%G2080><s%>"

Now <S%G1161><s%> when <S%G5613><s%> the captain <S%G4755><s%> of the temple <S%G2413><s%> [guard] and the chief <S%G749><s%> priests <S%G749><s%> heard <S%G191><s%> these <S%G3778><s%> words, <S%G3056><s%> they were greatly <S%G1280><s%> perplexed <S%G1280><s%> about <S%G4012><s%> them as to what <S%G5101><s%> would come <S%G1096><s%> of this. <S%G3778><s%>

But someone <S%G5100><s%> came <S%G3854><s%> and reported <S%G518><s%> to them, "Behold, <S%G2400><s%> the men <S%G435><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> you put <S%G5087><s%> in prison <S%G5438><s%> are standing <S%G2476><s%> in the temple <S%G2413><s%> and teaching <S%G1321><s%> the people! <S%G2992><s%>"

Then <S%G5119><s%> the captain <S%G4755><s%> went <S%G565><s%> along <S%G565><s%> with the officers <S%G5257><s%> and [proceeded] to bring <S%G71><s%> them [back] without <S%G3756><s%> <S%G3326><s%> violence <S%G970><s%> (for they were afraid <S%G5399><s%> of the people, <S%G2992><s%> lest <S%G3361><s%> they should be stoned <S%G3034><s%>).
And when they had brought <S%G71><s%> them, they stood <S%G2476><s%> them before <S%G1722><s%> the Council. <S%G4892><s%> And the high <S%G749><s%> priest <S%G749><s%> questioned <S%G1905><s%> them,

saying, <S%G3004><s%> "We gave <S%G3853><s%> you strict <S%G3852><s%> orders <S%G3852><s%> not to continue teaching <S%G1321><s%> in this <S%G3778><s%> name, <S%G3686><s%> and behold, <S%G2400><s%> you have filled <S%G4137><s%> Jerusalem <S%G2419><s%> with your teaching, <S%G1322><s%> and intend <S%G1014><s%> to bring <S%G1863><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> man's blood <S%G129><s%> upon us."

But Peter <S%G4074><s%> and the apostles <S%G652><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> and said, <S%G3004><s%> "We must <S%G1163><s%> obey <S%G3980><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> rather <S%G3123><s%> than <S%G2228><s%> men. <S%G444><s%>

"The God <S%G2316><s%> of our fathers <S%G3962><s%> raised <S%G1453><s%> up Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> you had put <S%G1315><s%> to death <S%G1315><s%> by hanging <S%G2910><s%> Him on a cross. <S%G3586><s%>

"He is the one whom God <S%G2316><s%> exalted <S%G5312><s%> to His right <S%G1188><s%> hand <S%G1188><s%> as a Prince <S%G747><s%> and a Savior, <S%G4990><s%> to grant <S%G1325><s%> repentance <S%G3341><s%> to Israel, <S%G2274><s%> and forgiveness <S%G859><s%> of sins. <S%G266><s%>

"And we are witnesses <S%G3144><s%> of these <S%G3778><s%> things; <S%G4487><s%> and [so is] the Holy <S%G40><s%> Spirit, <S%G4151><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> has given <S%G1325><s%> to those <S%G3588><s%> who obey <S%G3980><s%> Him."
But when they heard <S%G191><s%> this, they were cut <S%G1282><s%> to the quick <S%G1282><s%> and were intending <S%G1014><s%> to slay <S%G337><s%> them.

But a certain <S%G5100><s%> Pharisee <S%G5330><s%> named <S%G3686><s%> Gamaliel, <S%G1059><s%> a teacher <S%G3547><s%> of the Law, <S%G3547><s%> respected <S%G5093><s%> by all <S%G3956><s%> the people, <S%G2992><s%> stood <S%G450><s%> up in the Council <S%G4892><s%> and gave <S%G2753><s%> orders <S%G2753><s%> to put <S%G4160><s%> the men <S%G444><s%> outside <S%G1854><s%> for a short <S%G1024><s%> time. <S%G1024><s%>

And he said <S%G3004><s%> to them, "Men <S%G435><s%> of Israel, <S%G2475><s%> take <S%G4337><s%> care <S%G4337><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> you propose <S%G3195><s%> to do <S%G4238><s%> with these <S%G3778><s%> men. <S%G444><s%>

"For some <S%G3778><s%> time <S%G2250><s%> ago <S%G4253><s%> Theudas <S%G2333><s%> rose <S%G450><s%> up, claiming <S%G3004><s%> to be somebody; <S%G5100><s%> and a group <S%G706><s%> of about <S%G5613><s%> four <S%G5071><s%> hundred <S%G5071><s%> men <S%G435><s%> joined <S%G4346><s%> up with him. And he was slain; <S%G337><s%> and all <S%G3956><s%> who <S%G3745><s%> followed <S%G3982><s%> him were dispersed <S%G1262><s%> and came <S%G1096><s%> to nothing. <S%G3762><s%>

"After <S%G3326><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> man <S%G3778><s%> Judas <S%G2455><s%> of Galilee <S%G1057><s%> rose <S%G450><s%> up in the days <S%G2250><s%> of the census, <S%G582><s%> and drew <S%G868><s%> away <S%G868><s%> [some] people <S%G2992><s%> after <S%G3694><s%> him, he too <S%G2548><s%> perished, <S%G622><s%> and all <S%G3956><s%> those who <S%G3745><s%> followed <S%G3982><s%> him were scattered. <S%G1287><s%>

"And so <S%G2532><s%> in the present <S%G3568><s%> case, <S%G3568><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> to you, stay <S%G868><s%> away <S%G868><s%> from these <S%G3778><s%> men <S%G444><s%> and let <S%G863><s%> them alone, <S%G863><s%> for if <S%G1437><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> plan <S%G1012><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> action <S%G2041><s%> should be of men, <S%G444><s%> it will be overthrown; <S%G2647><s%>

but if <S%G1487><s%> it is of God, <S%G2316><s%> you will not be able <S%G1410><s%> to overthrow <S%G2647><s%> them; or <S%G3379><s%> else <S%G3379><s%> you may even <S%G2532><s%> be found <S%G2147><s%> fighting <S%G2314><s%> against <S%G2314><s%> God. <S%G2314><s%> "

And they took <S%G3982><s%> his advice; <S%G3982><s%> and after calling <S%G4341><s%> the apostles <S%G652><s%> in, they flogged <S%G1194><s%> them and ordered <S%G3853><s%> them to speak <S%G2980><s%> no <S%G3361><s%> more in the name <S%G3686><s%> of Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> and [then] released <S%G630><s%> them.

So <S%G3767><s%> they went <S%G4198><s%> on their way <S%G4198><s%> from the presence <S%G4383><s%> of the Council, <S%G4892><s%> rejoicing <S%G5463><s%> that they had been considered <S%G2661><s%> worthy <S%G2661><s%> to suffer <S%G718><s%> shame <S%G818><s%> for [His] name. <S%G3686><s%>

And every <S%G3956><s%> day, <S%G2250><s%> in the temple <S%G2413><s%> and from house <S%G3624><s%> to house, <S%G3624><s%> they kept <S%G3756><s%> <S%G3973><s%> right <S%G3756><s%> <S%G3973><s%> on teaching <S%G1321><s%> and preaching <S%G2097><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> [as] the Christ. <S%G5547><s%>
